thread.title: for your order unhappy customer
thread.title_full: Lufthansa reviewed by for your order unhappy customer

author: for your order unhappy customer
title: for your order unhappy customer
text: Try to get my son's airport tax back, but as I went with edream travel agency, they refuse to give the refund. I've tried to liaise between them but no use. Both accuse of each other. Lufthansa say they called me to settle this matter, but I had never received that call. I am so angry. Don't use this company.
